text: is a chain of convenience stores in Japan. It is the second biggest chain in Japan, 7-Eleven, is the biggest chain. FamilyMart used to be in the United States, it was called Famima!!, but then closed down. FamilyMart can also be found in other countries, like, China, Philippines, Vietnam, and Thailand. == Related pages == * 7-Eleven * Lawson (store) == References == == Other websites == * Category:1981 establishments in Japan Category:Retail companies of Japan Category:Companies listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange Category:Tokyo Category:Japanese shops
title: FamilyMart
